mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( notice_id, title, content, writer ) VALUES ( (select ifnull(MAX(notice_id)+1, 1) from notice a), #{title}, #{content}, "식당운영자" )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, title, content, writer, DATE_FORMAT(up_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as up_date, user_check, editor, DATE_FORMAT(edit_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as edit_time FROM notice WHERE notice_id=#{notice_id}
